ygData.subject: help, i'm stuck
ygData.msgSnippet: Help! I need the wisdom of high skill fletchers. I am trapped at skill 180 ... and cannot increase!  I have made 1000 arrows (200*5) and cannot get to 181! I
ygData.messageBody:
Help!
I need the wisdom of high skill fletchers.
I am trapped at skill 180 ... and cannot increase! I have made 1000 arrows
(200*5) and cannot get to 181!
I am making ceramic vane arrows --- alternating with steel shafts arrows cuz
i heard steel shaft increases skill faster (but is more expensive). I get
NO "item too trivial" message. So I assume I'm still gaining skill.
Is this normal? wtf ... do we cap at 180? Is it a level thing? I am level
23. My wis is 92 and int is 91 ... in fact all my stats are over 90...
except stam (84).

Any input, no matter how remotely trivial, would be appreciated.
